content.html: Thinking of open-sourcing the Developer Docs static site generator that we built from scratch at @crisp_im ; anyone interested? Write content in Markdown and API Blueprint. Has a built-in local search engine. Can be deployed to GH Pages. You can test it at docs.crisp.chat
